channel.title: CVE Feed for Pagelayer Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pagelayer Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43972|2024-09-18T14:16:42.571Z -- pagelayer%20team -- pagelayer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pagelayer Team PageLayer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PageLayer: from n/a through 1.8.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30465|2024-07-12T16:03:11.238Z -- pagelayer%20team -- pagelayer
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Pagelayer Team PageLayer.This issue affects PageLayer: from n/a through 1.8.1.
